code: import React from'react';import Character from'./Character';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';var CharactersList=function CharactersList(props){return React.createElement("div",{className:"charactersWrapper"},React.createElement("ul",{className:"charactersWrapper__list"},props.allCharacters.filter(function(character){return props.inputValue===''||character.name.toLowerCase().includes(props.inputValue.toLowerCase());}).map(function(character){return React.createElement("li",{className:"charactersWrapper__list__item",key:character.id},React.createElement(Link,{to:"/character/".concat(character.id)},React.createElement(Character,{characterId:props.characterId,characterImg:character.image,characterName:character.name,characterSpecies:character.species,id:character.id})));})));};export default CharactersList;
